title: Weekend Knitting: 25 Fun and Easy Projects
description: If only all knitting books were as simple and fun to use as this! From the first loop to the last seam, this invaluable resource provides answers to the questions that often stump new knitters. Once you're comfortable with the process, find an array of fabulous projects for fashion, accessories, children and the home - most of which can be completed over a weekend. From a sumptuous neckwarmer and a wispy heirloom wrap to a spirited tiger-striped scarf and a glamorous chequered pillow, each project employs a variety of easy techniques to keep the knitter constantly challenged. Each design is accompanied by clear, concise instructions and a full-colour photograph to make the stitch process a breeze. Furthermore, a section devoted to correcting mistakes will ensure that your knitting looks perfect. If you're looking for a rewarding and stress-free knitting experience, this easy-to-use book is sure to keep first-timers inspired
